title: and extended the Social Welfare Acts to provide for amendments in relation to
heading: 3. The amendments effected by sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2 of the Act of
text_raw:
3. The amendments effected by sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2 of the Act of 
2020 shall continue in operation for the period beginning on the 11th day of 
August 2020 and ending on the 31st day of March 2021.

title: and extended the Social Welfare Acts to provide for amendments in relation to
heading: 4. The amendments effected by sections 7 and 8 of Part 2 of the Act of
text_raw:
4. The amendments effected by sections 7 and 8 of Part 2 of the Act of 
2020 shall continue in operation for the period beginning on the 11th day of 
August 2020 and ending on the 17th day of September 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 August, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.

title: and extended the Social Welfare Acts to provide for amendments in relation to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No.155 of 
2020) extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of the 
Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020) from their original expiry date of 9 
May 2020 until 19 June 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 
207 of 2020) further extended the operation of the amendments effected by 
Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency 
Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 until 10 August 2020. 

This Order further extends the amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020, to 31 March 2021 as respects sections 4, 5 and 6, and to 17 
September 2020 as respects sections 7 and 8. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [285] 5
